name: Alpha - Absinthe Claro - Robusto
additionalNotes: Alpha Cigar Co.’s Absinthe Infused Claro is a hand-rolled premium is produced in Tamoboril, in the Dominican Republic with tobaccos aged for at least two years. Draped in a dark San Andres Claro wrapper, this cigar eludes a rich earthiness along with nutty and light chocolate notes from the Absinthe infused binder. Claro is a medium to full-bodied cigar delivering a complex array of flavors to ensure a delightful experience.
